segments.text: I ’ m Miss Sherman . What seems to be the problem ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , apparently I ’ Ve run up quite a bill . I was under the impression that the Junior Executive Holiday Package only cost 250 dollars per night . I ’ Ve just been informed that it ’ s actually 500 do
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s true . For the Junior Executive Room ... three nights ... yes , your bill should be $ 1,500
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I definitely was led to believe that a three-night stay would be $ 750 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The advertised rate is based on double occupancy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When I booked the room , your staff didn ’ t mention this . And the brochure and your promotional mailings do not mention that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . I had no idea our advertising was so misleading . It is here , but it ’ s in the fine print on the last page .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perhaps you could arrange to provide me with a new bill that reflects the advertised rate .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Normally I couldn ’ t do that . But under the circumstances , I ’ ll see what I can arrange.Customer satisfaction is our primary aim .
segments.speaker: S1
